references.paper_title: NeRF: Representing scenes as neural radiance fields for view synthesis
references.reason: This paper introduces NeRF, a foundational model for novel view synthesis that heavily influences 3D scene generation and is directly referenced and built upon in this paper.

references.paper_title: A style-based generator architecture for generative adversarial networks
references.reason: This paper introduces StyleGAN, a highly influential generative adversarial network architecture that is leveraged in the paper for realistic image generation.

references.paper_title: SceneDreamer: Unbounded 3D scene generation from 2D image collections
references.reason: This paper introduces SceneDreamer, a key prior work which is extended and improved upon by this paper for unbounded 4D city generation.

references.paper_title: GANcraft: Unsupervised 3D neural rendering of minecraft worlds
references.reason: This paper introduces GANCraft, a notable method for 3D scene generation that this paper builds upon, particularly regarding the use of GANs for scene generation.
This paper introduces InfiniCity, a method for generating unbounded 3D cities that this paper improves upon by incorporating 4D temporal information and more detailed scene representations.
